description: BCom (Regular) or Bachelor of Commerce is a three-year undergraduate course (four-year for BCom Honours) that trains students for several job profiles. Candidates are taught core subjects related to commerce and finance. In the three-year duration, the candidates are given options to choose, as per the University Norms, from a few elective subjects especially in finance and accounts. The programme is spread over six semesters / eight semesters. Graduating with a degree of B. Com makes the candidate eligible for working in a number of fields and also a choice to pursue other courses of higher education after completing B.Com.
professional_certifications: ACCA (Association of Chartered Certified Accountants) - UK
objective: Our programs are designed to equip students with comprehensive knowledge, practical skills, and global certifications, ensuring they are industry-ready and capable of excelling in diverse professional domains.
